DOC.brief_title: Peripheral Insulin Uptake Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Non-Diabetic Individuals
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion participant : write informed consent hemodynamically stable systolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg medical need undergo CAG procedure determine cardiologist Exclusion criterion participant : ongoing myocardial infarction determine elevated cardiac marker participation investigational trial within 90 day prior present study donation blood ( > 100 mL ) within 90 day prior present study serious mental impairment language problem i.e . prevent understand study protocol/aim Use recent use ( within 3 month study participation ) oral glucocorticoid Inclusion criterion nondiabetic individual : 30 year ≤ age ≤ 80 year ( extremes include ) fast glucose level < 7.0 mmol/L HbA1C < 6.5 % ( = < 48 mmol/mol ) Exclusion criterion nondiabetic individual : know T2DM/use glucoselowering medication Inclusion criterion T2DM patient : 30 year ≤ age ≤ 80 year ( extremes include ) fast glucose level > 7.0 mmol/L , HbA1C > 6.5 ( = > 48 mmol/mol ) know T2DM Exclusion criterion T2DM patient : treatment insulin preparation
